about.summary: Linear order and unimodal order (univariate) isotonic regression; bivariate isotonic regression with linear order on both variables.

name: r-iso
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.0-18' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-iso
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Iso_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/Iso/Iso_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2d7e8c4452653364ee086d95cea620c50378e30acfcff129b7261e1756a99504

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 3
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}        # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_fortran') }}  # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('Iso')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('Iso')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.stat.auckland.ac.nz/~rolf/
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: Linear order and unimodal order (univariate) isotonic regression; bivariate isotonic
    regression with linear order on both variables.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: Iso
# Version: 0.0-18
# Date: 2019-06-05
# Title: Functions to Perform Isotonic Regression
# Author: Rolf Turner <r.turner@auckland.ac.nz>
# Maintainer: Rolf Turner <r.turner@auckland.ac.nz>
# Depends: R (>= 1.7.0)
# Description: Linear order and unimodal order (univariate) isotonic regression; bivariate isotonic regression with linear order on both variables.
# LazyData: true
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# URL: http://www.stat.auckland.ac.nz/~rolf/
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2019-06-04 22:15:06 UTC; rolf
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-06-05 04:40:03 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
